svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/128.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="24.7.7"> <diagram name="페이지-1" id="nSCOGP_nJQzjrw7VoANo"> <mxGraphModel dx="2474" dy="839" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-1" value="카카오" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontStyle=1;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="414" y="180" width="136" height="180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-2" value="안드로이드" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="180" width="140" height="180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-3" value="백엔드" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="500" width="140" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-4" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="395" y="210" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="205" y="210" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-5" value="1. 로그인" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="265" y="170" width="70" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-6" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="210" y="200" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="400" y="200" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-7" value="2. 토큰 응답" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="260" y="210" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-8" value="3. 토큰으로 유저 정보 요청" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="220" y="270" width="160" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-9" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="205" y="300" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="395" y="300" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-10" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="395" y="310" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="205" y="310" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-11" value="4. 유저 정보 응답" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="310" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-13" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="100" y="370" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="100" y="490" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-14" value="5. 유저 정보로 로그인 요청" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-60" y="440" width="160" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-15" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="130" y="490" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="130" y="370" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-16" value="7. JWT 응답" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="135" y="440" width="90" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-17" value="6. 유저 정보로 DB 조회<div>없으면, DB 삽입 후 JWT 발급 및 응답</div><div>있으면, 바로 JWT 발급 및 응답</div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="190" y="510" width="210" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-18" value="백엔드에서는 카카오에서 인증된 유저 정보인지,<div>임의로 보낸 유저 정보인지 검증해야 함</div><div><br></div><div>검증 로직이 없다면, 아무 유저 정보로도 로그인이 되어버림</div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="620" width="310" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-19" value="8. 다음 요청부터는<div>받은 JWT를 항상 헤더에 실어서 백엔드에 요청</div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-160" y="350" width="260" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-20" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-170" y="340" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-21" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="180" y="150" width="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-22" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="580" y="280" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-23" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="200" y="720" width="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-25" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-23" target="Ppr1GztUqBXg2MCGBh-k-23"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div:
6. 유저 정보로 DB 조회
없으면, DB 삽입 후 JWT 발급 및 응답
있으면, 바로 JWT 발급 및 응답

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 505px; margin-left: 335px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
백엔드에서는 카카오에서 인증된 유저 정보인지,
임의로 보낸 유저 정보인지 검증해야 함
검증 로직이 없다면, 아무 유저 정보로도 로그인이 되어버림

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 220px; margin-left: 140px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
8. 다음 요청부터는
받은 JWT를 항상 헤더에 실어서 백엔드에 요청

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
